title: What in the Wow?! The Science of Awe (Encore - 8/9/21)
description:
Why in the world has Mindy has turned her old ice cream truck into a mini museum of Wow on Wheels? And how in the world will this “rolling thunder of science and wonder” inspire a sense of AWE in the neighborhood? Join Mindy, Guy Raz, and the rest of the gang on a trip down memory lane to explore WOW can lead to a love of science! It’s the Who, What, When, Where, Why, How, and Wow in the world of Awe and Wonder! (originally aired 5/25/2020)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
